item.title: How to Publish a Python Package: A Rudimentary Pipeline
item.description: PIPELINE Link to heading This is a concise step by step rough-guide on how to package and publish an open source python project, accompanied by an auto-generated documentation website (readthedocs.io). This post are my own notes for my future self in case I forget how to do this, so the explanations are minimal. If lost, follow the actual tutorials in the footnotes. Sources and links to tutorials on the bottom.
